item.description: Notes This queue-base is particularly finicky with piece order. Practice: https://jstris.jezevec10.com/play/mode/2971 Setups IS ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gQ4IeR4BeQ4Eeg0Q4BtR4Dei0BtQ4zhJeAgH.png]] ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gA8Bti0wwilB8BtA8g0xwRpF8wwglRpJ8JeAgH.png]] SO ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gQ4IeR4BeQ4Eeg0Q4BtR4RpBei0BtQ4RpLeAgH.png]] ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gA8Btzhglh0B8BtA8ilg0wwH8xwH8g0wwJeAgH.png]] LO ![[attachments_fumen/v115@JhglBeRpBeg0BeglBtRpR4g0BehlBtR4h0JeAgH.png]] !

item.title: 2nd Perfect Clear
item.description: [[perfect-clears/2nd/2nd - ISZO]] [[perfect-clears/2nd/2nd - TISZ]] [[perfect-clears/2nd/2nd - LSZO]]

item.title: 2nd: ISZO
item.description: ISZO is a symmetrical queue. Take note of if mirroring the setup is beneficial, such as for some queue-based setups.

item.title: 2nd: LSZO
item.description: LSZO is one of the worst queues for 2nd PC. 3-piece setups are preferred in order to increase solve percentage.

item.title: 2nd: TISZ
item.description: TISZ is a symmetrical queue. Take note of if mirroring the setup is beneficial, such as for some queue-based setups.

item.title: 7th
item.description: [[perfect-clears/7th/JSZ QB]]

item.title: Custom Minimals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Custom Cover-Based Minimals A special method of generating minimals, where you can get minimal sets for maximizing a setup’s quad clear chance, T-Spin chance, etc.

item.title: dpc_index
item.description: DPCs [[perfect-clears/dpc/SZ DPC]]

item.title: First Perfect Clear
item.description: Setups [[perfect-clears/1st/Perfect Clear Opener]] [[perfect-clears/1st/Jigsaw]] v115@9gzhFeh0BtFeg0RpBtEeg0RpQeAgH Sol: 98.333% v115@DhzhFeR4hlEeR4RpglGeRpglJeAgH Sol: 98.214%

item.title: Formatting
item.description: Generating Fumen Images Insert a fumen code into Rith’s custom <fumen> tags as you would in standard HTML. Images will be rendered in-site through JavaScript.

item.title: Fumen
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Fumen is a board editor made by knewjade.

item.title: Jigsaw
item.description: Jigsaw is a pair of two builds and their mirrors used as a high-scoring first PC or opener. It has a 100% build chance, considering mirrors, and the less efficient alternate build.

item.title: Minimals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} .minimal-graphic{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .

item.title: Parameter: Patterns
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} The –patterns parameter for [[sfinder-docs/solution-finder|solution-finder]] is one of the harder parameters to understand.

item.title: Path-Filter Minimals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Path-Filter Minimals The output from this may be bigger than the smallest possible set, but the difference can be marginal (one or two solves) as a trade-off for being able to find small solution sets quickly for setups whose strict minimals can’t be found within a reasonable timeframe.

item.title: Perfect Clear Opener
item.description: Shortened as PCO. An opener for getting a perfect clear. The build rate is 100% if an [[#alternative builds|alt built]] is considered.

item.title: Perfect Clears
item.description: Here are setups for various perfect clears. More to come later Categories [[perfect-clears/1st/1st_index|1st PC]] [[perfect-clears/2nd/2nd_index|2nd PC]] 3rd [[perfect-clears/dpc/dpc_index|DPC]] 4th 5th 6th [[perfect-clears/7th/7th|7th PC]] 8th 9th

item.title: S/Z DPC
item.description: Solution Finder Selected Setup v115@2gRpEewhBeRpEewhCeR4Bthlwhg0AeT4Btglwhi0R4?CeglJeAgH SELECT SETUP QUEUE 180/90 CHECKBOX COMPACT RESULTS DPC MINIMALS: SIX HUNDRED SCORING: ZERO EXTRA SOLUTIONS: FOURTEEN THOUSAND BUILD COVER: ZERO PERCENT v115@9gRpg0zhywRpg0B8Q4hlwwAtA8h0B8R4glBtF8Q4gl?

item.title: Save Minimals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} .minimal-graphic{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .

item.title: Solution Finder
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Solution Finder, often referred to as sfinder, is a program created by knewjade, who’s also responsible for various other tools.

item.title: Solution Finder: Cover
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Solution Finder’s Cover command outputs the probability of setting up/buidling a specified field (or multiple), given a specified pattern.

item.title: Solution Finder: Path
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} [[sfinder-docs/solution-finder|Solution Finder]]’s Path command outputs all the ways to get a perfect clear from a specified field, given a specified pattern.

item.title: Solution Finder: Percent
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Solution Finder’s Percent command outputs the probability of getting a perfect clear from a specified field, given a specified pattern.

item.title: Strict Minimals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} .minimal-graphic{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .

item.title: Terminals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Command Line Interface Command Line Interface is a terminal used to run programs.

item.title: ガムシロ積み (Gamushiro Stacking)
item.description: html{ display: flex; justify-content: center; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; } body{ width: 100vw; max-width: 1500px; } article{ padding: 0 1em; } #intro{ display: grid; grid-template-areas: 'text image'; grid-template-columns: 1fr 0.
